category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_shared_server_metadata_cache_mgr_cloning_interval
preference.preference_description: Specifies the number of update-and-sleep cycles the Teamcenter Shared Metadata Cache Service goes through, before cloning and terminating itself. The default value is 100. Valid Values: Any value greater than or equal to 100. If a value less than 100 is provided, the default value will be used.
